long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Adool, the ultimate chrome extension to level up your Gmail game with AI.
 
- Tired of typing out long-winded responses? Adool has got your back with its quick reply feature that drafts a response based on your email thread.
- Feeling uninspired? Let Adool's AI do the heavy lifting with the compose feature. Just write a few words and Adool will take care of the rest.
- Keyboard first. Access all of Adool's features with ease using simple keyboard shortcuts.
- Multilingual. Adool speaks many languages, so you can communicate effectively with anyone, no matter where they're from.
 
Adool is free until we figure things out, all we ask in return is your valuable feedback. 
 
Adool supports only Gmail for now. 
 
Website: Adool.co
